content.description: The following histogram summarizes the amount spent on plane tickets to travel home, in dollars, for a group of 30 college students.
content.question: If the interval size is decreased from $200 to $100, which of the following must remain the same on the new histogram?

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
